Every Soul May Enjoy Sanctification. It is the privilege of every soul to be favored with the rich blessing of sanctification, through the work of the Spirit of God upon the heart. But before this can be our experience, self must die, and we must learn to trust in the Lord as His dear children. 


                                     -346- 

By faith we must claim as our own His precious promises.--Letter 202, 1907, p. 1. ("To the Brethren Who Are Laboring in Merced," June 13, 1907.)
